get.summary: Get an answer from frequently asked questions about the service and data, e.g. how do I use the Tesla supercharger network?

infoLink.description: An optional link to a page with more information about the service, e.g. https://charge-my-ev.guide

faqs.description: Frequently asked questions about superchargers and their answers.

answer.description: The answer to the frequently asked question

link.description: An optional link to more information about the frequently asked question

get.summary: Get a list of all public charging stations throughout the United States. Includes Tesla and other vendors, like Rivian, ChargePoint, etc. Most but not all stations are lower charging speeds and available to non-Tesla vehicles, including Teslas.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The vendor/provider of the charging station, e.g. ChargePoint, Tesla, Rivian, etc.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The name of the charging station or business name location, e.g. Walmart, Target, etc.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City for which to query general public charging station information. E.g. Reno, Toronto, Berlin, New York, etc.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: US State for which to query for general public charging station information. e.g. NV, CA, NY, etc.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the charging station, e.g. 123 Main St. For locations, like a restaurant or business, use the title parameter instead.

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: The zip code of the charging station, e.g. 12345

parameters.name: planned
parameters.description: Whether to query for planned public charging stations

parameters.name: dc_fast_chargers
parameters.description: Whether to query for public charging stations with DC fast charging, e.g. Tesla Superchargers, Rivian, etc. This does not mean they are available to non-Tesla vehicles.

parameters.name: connectorType
parameters.description: The type of connector to query for, e.g. J1772, CHAdeMO, Tesla, etc.

parameters.name: pricing
parameters.description: The pricing structure of the charging station, if free or otherwise. For free, use 'free' otherwise leave blank for everything else.

parameters.name: facilityType
parameters.description: The type of facility the charging station is located at, e.g. Parking, Retail, Restaurant, Government Office, etc.

200.description: Provides a list of available public charging stations for electric vehicles in the United States. Displays the location's title, address, provider/vendor, connection types and permalink properties by default.

get.summary: Get a global total of superchargers available to non-Tesla owners/vehicles for use. Provides the total count and what countries the locations are available in and the relevant superchargers if granularity is requested.

200.description: Provides the total count of all available superchargers globally for non-Tesla vehicles, plus relevant data like countries, provinces/states and specific superchargers if requested.

count.description: Count of all available superchargers globally for non-Tesla vehicles

superchargers.description: The primary and relevant superchargers for non-Tesla vehicles based the user request

get.summary: Get supercharger information available to non-Tesla owners/vehicles by one or more parameters, e.g. city, province/state, country, region. Includes metadata like count and countries relevant to the request.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City for which to retrieve supercharger for non-Tesla vehicles information. E.g. Toronto, Berlin, New York, etc.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State for which to retrieve supercharger for non-Tesla vehicles information. e.g. CA, NY, etc.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country for which to retrieve supercharger for non-Tesla vehicles information. E.g. United States, Germany, etc.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Region for which to retrieve supercharger for non-Tesla vehicles information. E.g. North America, Europe, Asia, etc.

200.description: Currently available superchargers for non-Tesla vehicles information. Displays the location's title, stations overview, address and permalink properties by default. Amenities and other information for each location can be shown if the user requests it.

error.description: Whether or not an error occurred

errorMessage.description: Error message if an error occurred

items.description: Superchargers by cities relevant to the request. Can be used to summarize some of the results to the user and encourage them to fine tune their location request especially for larger dataset results like a country or region.

Superchargers by province/state relevant to the request. Can be used to summarize some of the results to the user and encourage them to fine tune their location request especially for larger dataset results like a country or region.

abbr.description: Abbreviation of the province/state, if available

stations.description: Number of overall stations in the province/state. Useful for summarizing results to the user and encouraging them to fine tune their location request.

countries.description: Superchargers by countries relevant to the request.

userTip.description: An optional tip for the user when their location request returns no results

params.description: The parameters used to retrieve the superchargers

last_updated.description: The date and time the charging station information was last updated

title.description: Name of the charger location. Typically takes on the form of {business_name} {city} - {provider} for ease

status.description: The status of the charging station, e.g. Available, Planned, Temporarily Unavailable, etc.

level_2_chargers_count.description: Number of charger stations available with level 2 charging

dc_fast_chargers_count.description: Number of charger stations available with DC fast charging

facility_type.description: The type of facility the charging station is located at, e.g. Parking, Retail, Restaurant, Government Office, etc.

state.description: The US state the charging station is located in

country.description: Standard country code, e.g US for United States

provider.description: The vendor/provider of the charging station

pricing.description: The pricing structure of the charging station, if free or otherwise

connnector_types.description: The types of connectors available at the charging station

access_days_time.description: The days and times the charging station is available for use

items.description: Contact information for the public charging station

map_url.description: A link to google maps with the location of the charging station in the format of https://www.google.com/maps/place/{latitude},{longitude}

title.description: Name of the supercharger location. Typically takes on the form of {city}, {state} for ease

open.description: Whether the supercharger station is currently open to the public or not

stations.description: Number of supercharger stations available at the location

compatibility.description: The number of supercharger stations, hours of availability, the type of plug/adapter, etc.

province_state.description: United States states should be in the form of their two character abbreviation code, e.g. CA for California. Other countries' state codes can be their full name.

country_code.description: Standard country code, e.g US for United States

region.description: Contitent the supercharger is located in

amenities.description: Amenities available at the supercharger location to show if requested by the user

items.description: Amenities available at the supercharger location

label.description: Amenity descriptor, e.g. Restaurant, Restroom, etc.

url.description: Google Maps URL to the relevant amenities of the supercharger location

permalink.description: A link to a page with more information about the supercharger's location in the format https://charge-my-ev.guide/l/{location_id}

meta.description: Metadata about the charging stations request

infoLink.description: An optional link to a page with more information about the service, e.g. https://charge-my-ev.guide

userTip.description: An optional tip for the user when their location request returns no results or is too broad

chargers.description: The charging stations that match the request and to be displayed to the user

infoLink.description: An optional link to a page with more information about the service, e.g. https://charge-my-ev.guide

userTip.description: An optional tip for the user when their location request returns no results or is too broad

superchargers.description: The superchargers that match the request and to be displayed to the user
